changeSet.sql: UPDATE t1 SET t1.item_value = '{"label": "Entity","icon": "user","horizontal": true,"children": [{"label":"Dimension","icon": "file-powerpoint-o","url": "./ivm/dimension-list","children": []},{"label": "Questions","icon": "file-powerpoint-o","url": "./ivm/question-list","children": []},{"label": "Questionnaire","icon": "registered","url": "./ivm/questionnaire-list","children": []},{"label": "Question Option","icon": "users","url": "./ivm/questionOption-list","children": []},{"label": "Reports","icon": "map-signs","url": "./ivm/reports","children": []},{"label": "Industry","icon": "map-signs","url": "./ivm/industry-list","_id": 9},{"label": "Region","icon": "exchange","url": "./ivm/region-list","children": []},{"label": "Metric","icon": "desktop","url": "./ivm/metric-list","children": []},{"label": "Initiative","icon": "desktop","url": "./ivm/initiative-list","children": []},{"label": "Task","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/initiative-task-list","children": [],"_id": 9},{"label": "SubTask","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/initiative-subtask-list","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "Import-Export","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/import-export","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "Import Data","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/master-data","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "Dimension Maturity ","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/dimensionMaturity","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "Industry Benchmark ","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/industry-benchmark-list","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "Geo","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/geo","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "SubIndustry","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/sub-industry","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "Transformation","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/transformation","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "Country","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/country","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "Dimension Exclusion","icon": "file-powerpoint-o","url": "./ivm/dimension-exclusion","children": []},{"label": "Organization","icon": "file-powerpoint-o","url": "./ivm/organization","children": []},{"label": "Value Lever","icon": "file-powerpoint-o","url": "./ivm/valueleverlist","children": []},{"label": "Questionnaire Mapping","icon": "file-powerpoint-o","url": "./ivm/questionnaire-mapping","children": []},{"label": "Opq","icon": "file-powerpoint-o","url": "./ivm/opq","children": []}]}' FROM usm_constant AS t1 JOIN (SELECT id FROM usm_constant WHERE item_value = '{"label": "Entity","icon": "user","horizontal": true,"children": [{"label":"Dimension","icon": "file-powerpoint-o","url": "./ivm/dimension-list","children": []},{"label": "Questions","icon": "file-powerpoint-o","url": "./ivm/question-list","children": []},{"label": "Questionnaire","icon": "registered","url": "./ivm/questionnaire-list","children": []},{"label": "Question Option","icon": "users","url": "./ivm/questionOption-list","children": []},{"label": "Reports","icon": "map-signs","url": "./ivm/reports","children": []},{"label": "Industry","icon": "map-signs","url": "./ivm/industry-list","_id": 9},{"label": "Region","icon": "exchange","url": "./ivm/region-list","children": []},{"label": "Metric","icon": "desktop","url": "./ivm/metric-list","children": []},{"label": "Initiative","icon": "desktop","url": "./ivm/initiative-list","children": []},{"label": "Task","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/initiative-task-list","children": [],"_id": 9},{"label": "SubTask","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/initiative-subtask-list","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "Import Data","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/master-data","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "Dimension Maturity ","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/dimensionMaturity","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "Industry Benchmark ","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/industry-benchmark-list","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "Geo","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/geo","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "SubIndustry","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/sub-industry","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "Transformation","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/transformation","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "Country","icon": "palette","url": "./ivm/country","children": [],"_id": 10},{"label": "Dimension Exclusion","icon": "file-powerpoint-o","url": "./ivm/dimension-exclusion","children": []},{"label": "Organization","icon": "file-powerpoint-o","url": "./ivm/organization","children": []},{"label": "Value Lever","icon": "file-powerpoint-o","url": "./ivm/valueleverlist","children": []},{"label": "Questionnaire Mapping","icon": "file-powerpoint-o","url": "./ivm/questionnaire-mapping","children": []},{"label": "Opq","icon": "file-powerpoint-o","url": "./ivm/opq","children": []}]}') AS t2 ON t1.id = t2.id;
